text:
int main ( ) { int t , n , i , k , p ; scanf ( "%d
" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { k = 0 ; p = 0 ; scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; long long a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] >= a [ i - 1 ] ) k ++ ; else { p = p + ( k * ( k + 1 ) ) / 2 ; k = 0 ; } } if ( k != 0 ) p = p + ( k * ( k + 1 ) ) / 2 ; printf ( "%d
" , p ) ; } return 0 ; }
